preview.html: Therefore, we find that most dreams lack logic and do not have an identity, and today we will learn from our website gptafser.com/ in detail the meaning of the dream in addition to its types and symbols, so stay with us. What is a dream in psychology? A dream is nothing but a reflection of the reality that a person lives in, and therefore we see in dreams more Fears of the human soul. Motives and desires through desires, life events and many illusions. People in the past believed that dreams were divine messages to man, conveying good news or warning about something. This belief remained widespread in antiquity for a long time, and even the ancients decided their fate. Of dreams. With the beginning of scientific development, dreams began to take another turn in understanding and definition. Many of these become mere whims and desires, which means that they cannot be relied upon to make or reverse an important decision, as was the case in the past. Post-evolutionary dreams have been defined In studying it as a group of feelings. The feelings that appear in a person and end with the end of the event that caused them. However, part of it remains in our subconscious sometimes in our dreams. We always see in dreams those distant hopes that we cannot reach in reality. Dreams can It also interweaves places and things from which the sleeper can get what he wants without having to wake up. For example, the sleeper may feel thirsty or hungry, and in the dream a bottle of water or a well appears to him for drinking and satisfaction, as well as food when hungry. But you must realize when You dream that you are urinating, then this is a trap of the subconscious. The most famous Western scholars were interested in dreams and understanding their nature, such as Freud and Carl Jung. On the other hand, Muslim scholars had a long history of interpreting dreams and allocating their types. The most famous of them are Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin and Ibn Khaldun. See also: Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams in LettersHow is a dream made? Many of us wonder how a dream occurs and when the dream begins after sleep. Why do we wake up in the midst of meaningful dreams despite the completion of other dreams that may not mean anything important to the dreamer? We will answer the previous questions in the following paragraphs: The process of weaving dreams takes place through a group of details that the subconscious mind extracts from the feelings and thoughts of the human soul. The above details contain a group of events, people and images that share one or more elements. The elements and details come together to form a dream Sometimes it may seem logical and at other times illogical. Dreams occur in the second stage of sleep, which is the deepest and in which there is rapid movement of the eyes with complete relaxation of the body’s muscles. The person often wakes up before the events of the dream are over, and this happens after the person sees a certain sign or response For something in itself. As for dreams that end, whether with a happy or sad event, they are merely self-talk with no benefit other than emptying the subconscious mind. Types of dreams Types of dreams are many and varied and differ from one person to another, but there are certain stereotypical dreams that happen to all people and this is due to the involvement of the

title: Interpretation of a cold dream for a married woman, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: Through this article, you can learn about the interpretation of a dream about a cold for a married woman in detail. The cold is considered one of the common diseases that spread in the winter and appears especially in those who suffer from a weak immune system. The affected person’s sense of smell and taste is weakened, as he loses the ability to inhale. Different smells or enjoying the taste of food, and on the other hand, seeing illness in general in a dream, dreams are unpleasant for dreamers because they indicate that something bad will happen to the dreamer. So what did the dream interpreters say about seeing a married woman suffering from a cold in a dream? We will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about a cold for a married woman. Seeing illness in general in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her life with her husband, if the illness is serious in the dream, as it It is one of the dreams that express the desire to repent and stay away from taboos. If a married woman sees that she has been cured of illness, then this vision is unpleasant and expresses the appearance of something unpleasant for her in her married life in reality. When a married woman sees that she has a cold and blows her nose in a dream, this Good news that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is suffering from a cold and is sneezing, this is a sign of her bad psychological state in reality. If a married woman is suffering from seizures in reality, then seeing her sneezing while she is suffering from a cold symbolizes the release of her vagina. Seeing a cold in a dream for a married woman expresses a change in circumstances for the better for the dreamer and the coming of joy and happiness. If the wife is in reality really sick and dreams that she has a cold, then this vision is an indication that she is suffering from a severe illness in reality. Seeing a cold in a dream for a married woman It expresses a feeling of restriction and oppression as a result of the control of those close to her in reality, whether it is her husband or a member of her family. Seeing a runny nose in a dream for a married woman is one of the hateful visions that express the appearance of something disturbing to the dreamer in reality. Interpretation of a dream about green nose mucus if a married woman sees it in a dream That she has cold, green mucus coming out of her nose, then this vision is a sign of paying off debts if she has debts. When a married woman sees her snot on the ground, this vision is an indication of children and symbolizes the birth of a girl, and God knows best. This vision also expresses the dreamer’s desire to avoid The problems that she faces in reality that cause her sadness and anxiety. If a married woman sees a child with green mucus coming out of his nose, then this vision symbolizes recovery from illness if the dreamer is sick. We present to you the most important things mentioned in the interpretation of a dream about a cold for a married woman and at the end of this article We must note that all of these interpretations express interpretations of dreams. They may come true or not. Only God knows the invisible. To interpret another dream, you can download the immediate application for interpreting dreams from the Encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of distributing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Many would like to know the meaning and interpretation of seeing money in a dream, what is the interpretation of distributing money in a dream, and how experts interpret giving and receiving money in a dream, and we will talk about this in this article on the encyclopedia website. Money has different meanings in a dream, and interpretations vary according to the dreamer’s condition and according to the nature of the dream and the symbols evident in it. Interpretation of the distribution of money in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Money is the jewel of the life of this world, and it is the foundation of life, and life is not right without it. A person always seeks to hoard and accumulate the largest possible amount of money, It is money that protects a person from the vicissitudes of life. It meets a person's daily needs, it is the basis of food, drink, shelter and clothing. Money can become a sign of evil as well as a sign of good. Some people always have money in front of their eyes and it leads them in life, others care about money but do not It makes it their priority. Seeing money in a dream raises many concerns as we have pointed out that sometimes a dream can have good connotations and it can have bad connotations. The interpretation of dreams is not based on clear scientific theories, but is mainly based on guesswork. Therefore, the interpretation may be wrong sometimes and may be wrong many times. And when you read the interpretation of any of the dreams, you must be absolutely sure that the unseen is only known to God, and that only God Almighty knows the unseen. Dream interpretation scholars have developed many Of the books and theories that explain various dreams. Commentators believe that the interpretation of distributing money in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to spread his knowledge and study. Money in dreams often indicates the high professional position that the dreamer occupies and may symbolize a high social status. But at other times, money can That suggests a completely opposite idea, being a woman for what you want to show people, even if it is the opposite. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream Psychologists have slightly different interpretations of the world of dreams. They see dreams as a manifestation of what is happening in the subconscious of a person. Every zodiac sign and every sign in a dream It has a logical psychological interpretation, and these interpretations are what explain the psychological state of the dreamer and clarify his feelings. The interpretation of distributing money in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s stinginess in reality and his desire to prove and show the opposite. Or it could indicate the control of money over all aspects and details of the dreamer’s life. Some believe Interpreters say that the interpretation of distributing money in a dream to the poor may symbolize the servant’s closeness to his Lord, and here the distribution of money is in the sense of charity and greed in exchange for reward. Or it may indicate that money controls the dreamer’s movements and a constant feeling of restrictions and lack of freedom in movement. Money and gold symbolize in many ways From situations to disagreements and difficult problems that take place between friends or workers in the field of work. If the dreamer expects a promotion at work or expects his professional position to rise in the near future, then this dream may be a sign that he will soon achieve his goal. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that takes n

title: Interpretation of seeing walnuts in a dream Seeing walnuts in a dream

preview.html: A dream about nuts for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, whether eating picked from the tree, or buying nuts for Ibn and Mazid Sirin, Nabulsi and Imam Al. - True interpretation of nuts: Walnuts in a dream are stored money. If you hear him rattling, this is a fight and disorder. Walnut is a non-Arab miser, depressing hardship, sleeping money owner. Whoever dreams that he is on a walnut, then he is connected to a large, non-Arab person, and if he gets off of it, the relationship between him and his partner who is attached to him will not be complete. And if he falls off of it and dies, he will be killed in front of a huge man or a king, and if the tree is broken, this huge man will die. He can see that he died when he fell, and if he does not die, then he will be saved. Whoever dreams that he cut a walnut has killed a foreigner, and the fruit of the walnut is money that he cannot obtain except through effort and effort, for the walnut is not eaten until it cracks. And his fat does not come out only in season. If he sees that he is picking walnuts from an orchard, then he will take money from a woman. If he peels, then it is food, and if he eats the walnut peel, then he is miserly, and if his wife sprinkles it, his clothes will be burned. And whoever sees that he is playing with nuts, then he is dealing with prohibited money. The walnut represents the righteous, the presidents, and the brothers. The walnut is interpreted as a healthy body and a long journey, and if the dreamer is a woman, then the walnut indicates long life. Walnut indicates the husband, unlike its letters, the permissibility of the husband, and the permissibility of difficult matters. And the nut cracks the money without getting tired. The fact that it contains a lot of nuts, it seems like a match. Eating a coconut in a dream This vision indicates a great lack of luck, and accepting this vision pessimistically for the sake of insight. From his joy and mood that does not accept a good vision, the dreamer will go through a miserable phase, will face some personal problems, and will leave money and power aside and fall into torment. Eating coconut flesh in a dreamYou follow the interpretation of eating coconut flesh with the same meaning as the life of a coconut, where the dreamer will experience Foresight of events that will bother him, and this stage will be very difficult. You see that you are eating a fresh coconut. Seeing him eating a coconut in a dream will be a good thing. The owner of the vision will advance in his career, paths and opportunities will appear leaving behind his enemies, profit will increase, new jobs will open before him, and in terms of money he will gain the unresolved power on anyone's back. Seeing dry walnuts in a dream It is not good to see dry walnuts in a dream, because it shows The owner of this vision lives without equipment and money and livelihood appear. Financially, you will lose your credit and borrow money, and he will face some major difficulties in the matter of continuity of life. Eating a rotten coconut in a dream Eating a rotten coconut in a dream will be accompanied by harm from people and he will receive a blow from people he trusts and you will be very sorry. Removing a coconut from the tree in In a dream, you accept the vision of removing a coconut from a tree. The person who sees this vision will have his hands full and money will increase thanks to it and your problems will be alleviated. Seeing a coconut in a dreamInterpretation This is against me How did you bring me coconuts, but coconuts indicate people with bad intentions

title: Interpretation of house renovation in a dream

preview.html: However, if the house is full of chaos or some updates are being made, the interpretation is completely different, and in order not to exaggerate, let us learn in detail the interpretation of this dream through the Mufsir.com website.Interpretation of seeing a house renovation in a dream for one girlSeeing a house renovation in a girl’s dream She is single. However, the dreamer changed her view of what was happening around her and her way of thinking developed and she began to deal with those around her in a new way. Modern interpretation scholars say that renovating a house is in the dream of a girl who has never been married before. Evidence of a major change in her personality and thoughts. Something will be reflected in her life, and this change will be positive, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying an old, spacious house. Interpretation of seeing a house being renovated in a dream for a married woman. Seeing house renovation in a dream for a married woman who is suffering from many problems with her husband. In order for calm and stability to return to her life again. And that friendship and understanding will fill her life, God willing. If the dreamer is late in giving birth or desires to become pregnant again and sees in her dream that she is renovating her house. It is a sign of an imminent pregnancy and this event will bring joy and happiness to her heart and the heart of her husband. Interpretation of seeing a house renovated in a dream for a man and its meaning: The house In a man's dream, he always goes to his wife, and the new house expresses the new wife. But renovating the house in a dream expresses a change in the husband's attitude toward his wife. He neglected her for a long time and treated her inappropriately. Seeing house renovation in the dream of a person who is going through problems and crises in his life indicates a collapse. His worries and relief from his ordeal, God willing. Everyone who has debts will be shot soon. And whoever delays in having children will be blessed with good offspring, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of entering an unknown house for single women. The meaning of seeing house renovation in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman usually sees During pregnancy, there are many strange and incomprehensible visions. This is due to the constant stress that she feels as her due date approaches. Among these visions is the vision of renovating the house. Whoever sees in her dream that she is renovating her house, then she is about to give birth and will give birth to a boy, God willing. The dream also symbolizes The preparations that the dreamer makes to receive her fetus, such as a Sbo party and other joyful things. Interpretation of the vision of renovating a house in a dream for young people and its meaning. Interpretation of the dream of renovating a house in a dream for young people is a positive dream. Which expresses the insight that builds his life and plans for his future. And tries hard to work towards achieving Its goals. Seeing house renovation in a young man’s dream indicates engagement and engagement. Whoever renovates his house in a modern way and at a high cost will marry a girl from a large and rich family, and God knows best. You may be interested: Interpretation of a dream of a large and spacious house for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing house renovation in a divorced woman’s dream. It is said that seeing Restoring the old house in a divorced woman’s dream is a sign of her returning to her ex-husband, but after many changes in his personality and outlook on life, so that life between them will not become as it was before. Whoever sees her new home in the dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting hair?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for another person. Interpretation of dreams about cutting hair for another person. Cutting hair for another person for single, married and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream is a dream of many people, but many do not know about multiple interpretations. title: Interpretation of prison in a dream Entering prison in a dream

preview.html: A vision of prison for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, the meaning of a prisoner, and I dreamed that I was in prison unjustly and I was crying, a vision of getting escaped and sentenced to prison by Ibn Sirin, the authentic Imam and others. Prison has many interpretations when you see it in a dream. Some interpretation scholars have confirmed that prison is in a dream. If someone sees that he is crying inside the prison walls, this is evidence of relief from pain and a way out of the crisis that was falling into him, and it will be a sign of a lot of new life and enjoyment of appearances. Of joy and pleasure. Interpretation of prison in a dream. Prison in a dream shows what pigeons show and it shows the disease that prevents one from acting and standing. Perhaps it refers to the interpretation of the mind and the grave and to some ancient Arab interpretations. Prison is hell. It is the prison of the sinner and the infidel, the abode of punishment and the place of criminals and darkness. Everyone who sees himself in Prison may suffer from anxiety or worry about the size of this prison or its condition and conditions. Whoever sees a prisoner in his dreams, whether it is a real prison or a closed room, is necessarily a person who is going through a difficult period of stress or turmoil and sadness. He has no family or friends.” The prison that appears in our dreams is actually a psychological or spiritual prison and not a physical prison. Perhaps the prisoner in this dream symbolizes the dreamer’s fears and sometimes his negative fantasies and obsessions. Prison in a dream indicates the weakness of the dreamer and his inability to move. As for the message that comes from this vision, it is an invitation to investigate the causes of his psychological alienation. Most of those who see prison in their dreams suffer from psychological pain. Deep and most of them are completely unable to express their feelings or thoughts. If the prison door appears open, or if the dreamer sees a policeman or a lawyer standing next to him and trying to help him, this often indicates an imminent psychological breakthrough. If the dreamer sees the key to his cell or sees that the jailer Smiling, its interpretation is definitely good, and in this case the dream is considered good news, because the dreamer will resume his life normally and happily. At the same time, he will be freed from all worries, sorrows, misfortunes, and setbacks. If a married woman sees that she is visiting her husband in prison, and in reality she has been sentenced, this interpretation is better, God willing. Explanation of entering prison on a false charge. Imprisoning an innocent or oppressed person in a dream indicates the cruelty of his family or His society. Whoever sees that he is unjustly imprisoned, then in his waking life he is exposed to complaints from his family, friends, or his professional environment. An oppressed prisoner in a dream represents oppression. Whoever sees someone entering prison is unjust or guilty. This is an expression of the person’s suffering from parental alienation or the dominance of some of them. And their hatred for him. Interpretation of crying inside the prison in a dream. Soft crying in a dream is praiseworthy, and crying between or within the prison walls is an expression of the end of distress and the beginning of a new phase of life characterized by joy and happiness. Interpretation of leaving or escaping from prison in a dream. If someone sees in a dream that He will leave prison after his acquittal. This is a good expression and indicates the release of the judge

title: The 15 months + Interpretation of dreaming of dirt in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dust by Ibn Sirin: Dust in a person’s dream is evidence of the presence of a person in the dreamer’s life who treats him in a mysterious way. Seeing a fierce storm of dust indicates fighting in life and trying to get rid of problems. Seeing yourself getting rid of dust in a dream means that there are some difficulties in starting a new romantic relationship Seeing dust in the form of carbon is a sign of negligence. If one sees in a dream that he is completely covered in dust, this indicates problems that the dreamer is facing. Shaking dust by the hand indicates the loss of money and the need for those around him to repay his debts. If one dreams of dust falling from the sky This is good and praiseworthy news for the dreamer. If dust falls in large quantities from the sky, this indicates the misfortunes that the dreamer will be exposed to. Interpretation of a dream about dirt according to Nablus. Seeing dust in a dream will indicate some problems in the dreamer’s life that he does not know about. Seeing to get rid of the dust who is in the house is evidence of Many positive changes in the dreamer's life. Seeing him eating dust in a dream is a sign of abuse from some people. Seeing frozen dust in a dream is a sign of goals that the dreamer wants to achieve. Seeing dust on the body is an indication of problems that the viewer faces in his life. Interpretation A dream about dust for a man: Seeing a dusty man in his place is a sign of earning a lot of money. Seeing a man in a dream collecting dust in a bowl means saving money for the benefit of children. Seeing dust on the roof of the house indicates betrayal of a close person. Seeing cleaning powder is a sign of lack of money. I secrete Dust in a dream is evidence that the viewer gets a lot of money and food. If a man sees in a dream that he is removing dust from his house, this indicates the loss of his wife’s money. Interpretation of a dream about dust for a married woman: Seeing dust on a married woman in a dream is evidence of a lot of money and livelihood that she will obtain. If a married woman sees that she is shaking off her clothes, this indicates the loss of money. If he sees in a dream that he is sitting in the dirt, this indicates money. Seeing a severe dust storm is a sign of slander about one of the things that a married woman desires. Add the dream that you would like to interpret in Comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
